body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/2.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-jenama-terkini-hanya-untuk-anda/)__

__03/06/2022__

__Your Weekly Deals__

More new brands & deals by our existing brand partners just for you! Shop online with our brand partners via Raiz Rewards and earn a percentage of your purchase invested back into your Raiz account. \*

Just click the “__Shop Online Here__” button via Raiz Rewards to be on your way to get the cash reward.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

### New Brands

__Singapore Airlines__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/24.png)

__(0.49% invested)__

Explore the world and experience a journey unlike any other on some of the most comfortable and spacious aircraft in the world. __Singapore Airlines__ Group flies to over 130 cities around the globe, bringing you closer to the people and places you care about.

Book online now with __Singapore Airlines__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __0.49%__ of your booking amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__AliExpress__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/23.png)

__(+ up to 4.41% invested)__

__AliExpress__ is an online marketplace created by Alibaba.com. Shop online for over 111 million quality deals on Fashion, Accessories, Computer Electronics, Toys, Tools, and others.

Shop online now with __AliExpress__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __4.41%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

### __Promotions__

__Lazada__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/blog-size-900-x-506px-1.png)__

__(+ up to 9.1% invested)__

Shop online now with __Lazada__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 9.1%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Special Promotion: __

*   Use promo code __6622kPrBG__ to enjoy an extra RM5 off with a minimum spend of RM50
*   Valid from 6 June 2022 until 8 June 2022
*   Only for Lazada’s existing customer

__  
Hermo__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/25.png)

__(+1.47% invested)__

Shop online now with Hermo through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.47%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Special Promotion: Hermo’s 10th Anniversary Sale__

*   From now until 12 June
*   Discount of up to 70%
*   Buy 1 Free 1 promotions
*   Special anniversary gifts
*   Free shipping!
*   Tentalizing Super 10 e-Vouchers: RM10 off with min spent RM20 on specific brands (Laneige, Innisfree, Cosrx, Pyunkang Yul and more)
*   Daily Shocking Deals from now until 12 June 2022

__Focus Point__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/26.png)

__(+up to 3.92% invested)__

Shop online now with __Focus Point__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __up to 3.92%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Special Promotion:__

*   Spend a minimum of RM500 in a single order to get a HOSHI Lens Discount Voucher worth up to RM150\*
*   Get 30% off for the purchase of any eyewear promotions + free Hoshi Lens
*   Use code __EXTRA16__ to enjoy an extra discount of RM16.
*   Promotion valid from now until 30th June 22.  
    *\*Terms & Conditions apply*

__Malaysia Airlines__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/06/27.png)

__(+1.4% invested)__

Book online now with __Malaysia Airlines__ through Raiz Rewards and you’ll get __1.4%__ of your purchase amount invested back into your Raiz account.

__Special Promotion:__

*   Travel seamlessly between Johor Bahru and Kuching. Flights available 3 days a week.
*   Travel Period: 8 June – 12 June 2022​ | 7 September – 11 September 2022​
